fields.name: string - display name (Title Case, English)
fields.primary_aromas: list[string] - 2–6 concise aroma tags that drive the wheel segment
fields.pairings: list[object] - edges to other ingredients with optional 'strength' (0.0–1.0)
fields.surprise_pairings: list[string] - optional curated pairings from book callouts
fields.sources: list[object] - [{type:'book', title:'The Flavor Matrix', page: int}]

merge_strategy.edge_merge: pairings by 'target' keep max(strength) if both exist
